title: Saturday Studio: Maren Hassinger
short_description: Drop in and join artist Maren Hassinger in the creation of a collective knotted sculpture.
description:
Join artist Maren Hassinger in the creation of a collective knotted sculpture. Drop in anytime between noon and 2:00 for conversation with the artist and fellow participants as you work together to make something intricate and extraordinary. All experience levels are welcome.

In case of inclement weather, the event will move to Studio A of the Ryan Learning Center.

This program is presented in connection with the exhibition Maren Hassinger: This Is How We Grow, on view from September 30, 2023, to April 21, 2024, on the Bluhm Family Terrace.

Maren Hassinger (American, b.1947) has built an expansive practice that articulates the relationship between nature and humanity. Carefully choosing materials for their innate characteristics, Hassinger has explored the subjects of movement, family, love, nature, environment, consumerism, identity, and race.
